Bay Area Coronavirus Relief Organization

Mission Statement

We are a coalition of high schools in the Bay Area dedicated to reducing the impact of the coronavirus outbreak by providing hospitals, homeless shelters, and other impacted institutions with personal protective equipment (PPE).

Easy to Use

Allows individuals affected by the virus to upload their location data and members of the community to compare their own location to verify whether they have potentially been exposed to the virus.

Easy to Use

Allows individuals affected by the virus to upload their location data and members of the community to compare their own location to verify whether they have potentially been exposed to the virus.

Easy to Use

Allows individuals affected by the virus to upload their location data and members of the community to compare their own location to verify whether they have potentially been exposed to the virus.

User Privacy

Checking your exposure to Covid-19 does not require you make an account and all personal data is kept completely anonymous and any sensitive data can be removed with the tools this website provides.

Detailed Reporting

Provides a detailed log of possible exposures, taking into account time and location. In addition, this tool allows you to view locations which have a high rate of Covid-19 exposure.

Our Strategy

Data Collection

First, you download location history data fromGoogle Takeout. Assuming you haven't disabled this feature, this file will contain your entire location history since you started your account. As such, it can be rather large. Unzip the file and uploadLocation History.json.

Data Processing

If data is uploaded to our server, we anonymize it to preserve user privacy, and then store it in a MySQL database. We use an Octree with latitude, longitude, and time as the three dimensions in order to detect collisions.

Data Analysis

Most data analysis is done client side. Your location history is compared with the location history of people who may have coronavirus, and you will be able to explore locations where you may have been exposed. We useOpenStreetMap to graphically visualize results.
